summary: The Dennis and Lois Krisfalusy Act, introduced in the House of Representatives on February 13, 2025, aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code concerning veterans' benefits. Specifically, the bill proposes to expand eligibility for headstones, markers, and burial receptacles provided by the Department of Veterans Affairs to certain individuals who died before November 11, 1998. This expansion impacts the criteria for receiving these burial benefits for veterans.
